title: New fonts from TypeTogether
content:
[TypeTogether](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017020815/http:/www.type-together.com/tt.php) is proud to announce the recent release of two new font families:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017020815im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Cora_4296.gif)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017020815im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Bree_5594.gif)

[Cora](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017020815/http:/www.type-together.com/ampl_font.php?idpuente=17), designed by Bart Blubaugh, is a sans serif with an experimental bent, offering a large x-height, some contrast of stroke weight, and capitals inspired by classical lettering. It has 6 weights, Regular, Medium, Bold and the accompanying Italics.  
 [Bree](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017020815/http:/www.type-together.com/ampl_font.php?idpuente=13), designed by Veronika Burian and José Scaglione, is a fluid upright italic with a set of alternate letters when a more classical look is desired. It is based on TypeTogether's logotype and contains 5 weights, Thin, Light, Regular, Bold and Extrabold.
